function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cytokine bursts caused by vaccine leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)","Impact":"Increased risk of death in COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Ensure COVID-19 vaccine candidates have a good safety profile and do not cause cytokine bursts","Technologies":"Advanced vaccine testing and safety assessment techniques","People":"COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Vaccine researchers and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Need for multiple doses of COVID-19 vaccine","Impact":"Delayed wide-scale production and distribution of the vaccine","Mitigation":"Develop efficient manufacturing and distribution strategies for multi-dose vaccines","Technologies":"Advanced vaccine production and distribution technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"Global health organizations and vaccine manufacturers"},{"Description":"Use of unapproved drugs for COVID-19 treatment","Impact":"Uncertain effectiveness and potential risks to patients","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous clinical trials and regulatory approval processes for drugs","Technologies":"Clinical trial management systems and drug evaluation tools","People":"Patients with COVID-19","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies and regulatory authorities"}]}
